entry.overview: Add redirect to login page when ajax request is done for guest user
entry.description: Adding product to wishlist is possible only for logged in users by default (without guest-wishlist module). Ajax request not resolved with `backUrl` as a response will trigger redirect to login page with proper param in order to add the product to the wishlist right after logging in.
